question: Amazon India recently partnered with Eastern Railways, to set up a pick-up kiosk in which railway station?
explanation:
e-Commerce giant, Amazon India recently partnered with Eastern Railways, to set up a pick-up kiosk in Sealdah railway station in Kolkata.
By selecting the railway station as their pick-up location while ordering their products in the companyâ€™s website or application, the customers can pick up their packages conveniently at the station. In 2019, Amazon successfully launched pick-up kiosks at four railway stations in Mumbai by partnering with Indian Railways.
